sentence.Network_en: Paleontologists also debated whether Archaeopteryx could fly.
sentence.Network_cn: 古生物学家还讨论了始祖鸟是否会飞的问题.

sentence.Network_en: However, the study of archaeopteryx has never stopped.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是, 关于始祖鸟的研究,却一直源源不断.

sentence.Network_en: Except some with the birds similar characteristic, the archaeopteryx has the beastly foot class dinosaur's characteristic.
sentence.Network_cn: 除了一些与鸟类相似的特征, 始祖鸟具有很多兽脚类恐龙的特征.

means.word_mean: 1. extinct primitive toothed bird of the Jurassic period having a long feathered tail and hollow bones; usually considered the most primitive of all birds

auth_sentence.content: Recently, however, the supposed "world's oldest known bird, " Archaeopteryx, was found to be a non-avian dinosaur.
